explains: adj. 可互换的；可交换的；可交替的
wordGroup: interchangeable parts 通用件；互换部件

sentences.en: His greatest innovation was the use of interchangeable parts.
sentences.cn: 他最伟大的创新是使用了可互换部件。

sentences.en: The V8 engines are all interchangeable with each other.
sentences.cn: V8型的发动机都可以相互替换。

sentences.en: By the seventh century, the word teon had become interchangeable with the tachund or hund of the Anglo-Saxon language, and so 100 was denoted as hund teontig, or ten times ten.
sentences.cn: 到了7世纪，“teon”这个词就已经可以与安格鲁-撒克逊语言中的“tachund”或“hund”互换了，因此100可以用“hund teontig”或“ten times ten”来表示。
